title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Access to
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Access to 
Anti-Money Laundering Information by Tax Authorities) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (access anti-money laundering information tax authorities) (amendment) regulation 2022

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 2. The European Union (Access to Anti-Money Laundering Information
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Access to Anti-Money Laundering Information 

by Tax Authorities) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 387 of 2021) are amended – 

(a) 

in Regulation 3 – 

(i) 

(ii) 

in paragraph (1), by the insertion of “, 32a” after “31” in 
both places where it occurs, 

in paragraph (2)(a), by the substitution of “, the Central 
Register of Beneficial Ownership of Trusts and the Central 
Mechanism of Ownership of Bank and Payment Accounts 
and Safe-Deposit Boxes, and” for “and the Central 
Register of Beneficial Ownership of Trusts, and”, 

(iii) 

in paragraph (4)(a) – 

(I) 

by the insertion of “or the Central Mechanism of 
Ownership of Bank and Payment Accounts and 
Safe-Deposit Boxes, as the case may be,” after 
“registers”, and 

(II) by the insertion of “or the Central Mechanism of 
Ownership of Bank and Payment Accounts and 
Safe-Deposit Boxes, as the case may be,” after 
“register” in both places where it occurs, 

and 

in paragraph (5), by the insertion of “or the Central 
Mechanism of Ownership of Bank and Payment Accounts 
and Safe-Deposit Boxes, as the case may be,” after 
“registers”, 

(iv) 

and 

1 OJ No. L 64, 11.03.2011, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 104, 25.03.2021, p. 1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [704] 3 

(b) 

in Regulation 4, by the insertion of the following paragraph after 
paragraph (1): 

“(1A) On there being made of the Central Bank of Ireland, 
by an authorised officer, a request for access, in accordance with 
Regulation 3(2)(a), to the Central Mechanism of Ownership of 
Bank and Payment Accounts and Safe-Deposit Boxes, the 
Central Bank of Ireland shall afford the authorised officer 
access, in a timely manner, to the Central Mechanism of 
Ownership of Bank and Payment Accounts and Safe-Deposit 
Boxes.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 December, 2022. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [704]
